archimate:Capability.name: General Ledger
archimate:Capability.documentation: General Ledger applications provide the required functionality to create a book of final entry summarizing all of a company's financial transactions, through offsetting debit and credit accounts.

properties.value: Chart of Accounts Maintenance General Ledger Compliance General Ledger Drilldowns General Ledger Integration General Ledger month-end closing General Ledger Security Multi-ledger Financial Reporting
